languages.text: "Капитан сообщает об уничтожении пиратского судна — еретики не знали, что Саргона больше не хозяин "Бессердечного", и пытались заключить сделку по покупке пленников. Ваши слуги тотчас нанесли неожиданный удар и разгромили пиратов — капитан рад преподнести вам шаттл с добытыми трофеями".

"The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."
languages.original_text: "Капитан сообщает об уничтожении пиратского судна — еретики не знали, что Саргона больше не хозяин "Бессердечного", и пытались заключить сделку по покупке пленников. Ваши слуги тотчас нанесли неожиданный удар и разгромили пиратов — капитан рад преподнести вам шаттл с добытыми трофеями".

traits.locale_text: "The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the pirates. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the pirates. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

"The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

languages.text: 「船長が海賊船を撃破したことを報告します。異端者たちはサルゴナがもはやハートレスの主でないことを知らず、捕虜の買い取りを申し出ました。あなたの部下たちは即座に奇襲を仕掛け、盗賊を討ち果たしました。船長は戦利品を満載したシャトルをあなたにお届けできることを喜んでいます」
languages.original_text: "The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

traits.locale_text: 「船長が海賊船を撃破したことを報告します。異端者たちはサルゴナがもはやハートレスの主でないことを知らず、捕虜の買い取りを申し出ました。あなたの部下たちは即座に奇襲を仕掛け、盗賊を討ち果たしました。船長は戦利品を満載したシャトルをあなたにお届けできることを喜んでいます」

languages.text: "Kaptan, bir korsan gemisinin yok edildiğini bildirdi. Taşkalp'in efendisinin artık Sargona olmadığını bilmeyen kâfirler, esir satın alma teklifinde bulunmuş. Hizmetkârlarınız ise derhâl saldırıya geçerek haydutları ortadan kaldırmış. Kaptan, ganimet yüklü bir mekiği size sunmaktan gurur duyuyor."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptan, bir korsan gemisinin yok edildiğini bildirdi. Taşkalp'in efendisinin artık Sargona olmadığını bilmeyen kâfirler, esir satın alma teklifinde bulunmuş. Hizmetkârlarınız ise derhâl saldırıya geçerek haydutları ortadan kaldırmış. Kaptan, ganimet yüklü bir mekiği size sunmaktan gurur duyuyor."

languages.text: «El capitán informa de la destrucción de una nave pirata. Los herejes no sabían que Sargona ya no estaba al mando de la Desalmada y se ofrecieron a comprar prisioneros. Sus sirvientes atacaron con presteza, eliminando a los bandidos. El capitán se alegra de poder enviarle una lanzadera cargada de botín».
languages.original_text: "The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

traits.locale_text: «El capitán informa de la destrucción de una nave pirata. Los herejes no sabían que Sargona ya no estaba al mando de la Desalmada y se ofrecieron a comprar prisioneros. Sus sirvientes atacaron con presteza, eliminando a los bandidos. El capitán se alegra de poder enviarle una lanzadera cargada de botín».

languages.text: “无心号的舰长报告说，他们最近摧毁了一艘海盗船。那些异端分子不知道萨戈纳已经死了，以为无心号的船长依然是他，还提出了购买俘虏的请求。您的仆人突然发动突袭，把那些海盗全都消灭掉了。无心号的舰长送来了一艘穿梭机，上面装满了战利品。”
languages.original_text: "The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

traits.locale_text: “无心号的舰长报告说，他们最近摧毁了一艘海盗船。那些异端分子不知道萨戈纳已经死了，以为无心号的船长依然是他，还提出了购买俘虏的请求。您的仆人突然发动突袭，把那些海盗全都消灭掉了。无心号的舰长送来了一艘穿梭机，上面装满了战利品。”

languages.text: "Der Captain meldet die Zerstörung eines Piratenschiffs ... die Ketzer wussten nicht, dass Sargona nicht mehr das Kommando über die Heartless hat und wollten Gefangene kaufen. Eure Diener haben die Briganten umgehend unschädlich gemacht. Der Captain freut sich, Euch ein Shuttle voller Beute zu überlassen."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

traits.locale_text: "Der Captain meldet die Zerstörung eines Piratenschiffs ... die Ketzer wussten nicht, dass Sargona nicht mehr das Kommando über die Heartless hat und wollten Gefangene kaufen. Eure Diener haben die Briganten umgehend unschädlich gemacht. Der Captain freut sich, Euch ein Shuttle voller Beute zu überlassen."

languages.text: « Le capitaine nous informe d'une destruction de vaisseau pirate : des hérétiques n'étaient pas au courant que le Sans-Cœur n'appartenait plus à Sargona et souhaitaient acheter des captifs. Vos serviteurs se sont assurés de délivrer un châtiment adapté et ont dispersé les brigands. Le capitaine a ainsi le plaisir de vous faire parvenir une navette remplie de butin. »
languages.original_text: "The captain reports the destruction of a pirate ship — the heretics did not know that Sargona was no longer the master of the Heartless, and offered to buy captives. Your servants immediately delivered a sudden strike and dispatched the brigands. The captain is pleased to present to you a shuttle loaded with spoils."

traits.locale_text: « Le capitaine nous informe d'une destruction de vaisseau pirate : des hérétiques n'étaient pas au courant que le Sans-Cœur n'appartenait plus à Sargona et souhaitaient acheter des captifs. Vos serviteurs se sont assurés de délivrer un châtiment adapté et ont dispersé les brigands. Le capitaine a ainsi le plaisir de vous faire parvenir une navette remplie de butin. »
